H0.text: A community is a very large ecosystem.

H1.text: An ecosystem is a very large community.

H2.text: An ecosystem includes a community and abiotic factors.

H3.text: A community includes an ecosystem and abiotic factors, illustrating the relationship between an ecosystem and a community.

A4.text: An ecosystem (or ecological system) consists of all the organisms and the abiotic pools (or physical environment) with which they interact.

A5.text: The biotic and abiotic components are linked together through nutrient cycles and energy flows.
